PlantGenetics.TraitDef.label: Heating
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.desc: Raises temperate around itself - increases heat/second by 1.5x and max temperature by 2°
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.shortdesc: The plant will raise the surrounding temperature

PlantGenetics.TraitDef.label: Cooling
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.desc: Reduces temperature around itself - reduces heat/second by 1.5x and reduces min temperature by 2°
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.shortdesc: The plant will lower the surrounding temperature

PlantGenetics.TraitDef.label: self healing
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.desc: Heals damage over time - decreases ticks/heal by 0.75x
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.shortdesc: The plant will heal health over time

PlantGenetics.TraitDef.label: polux
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.desc: Absorbs pollution around itself - increases radius of pump and pumps/waste pack by 1.5x, decreases interval between pumps by 0.5x
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.shortdesc: The plant will absorb nearby pollution and release it as wastepacks

PlantGenetics.TraitDef.label: polluter
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.desc: Pollutes area around itself - increases radius by 1.5x and decreases interval between pollutes by 0.5x
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.shortdesc: The plant will pollute it's surroundings

PlantGenetics.TraitDef.label: gaurenlen
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.desc: Spawns mini dryads - decreases interval between spawning and increases max spawn points both by 1.5x
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.shortdesc: The plant will spawn mini dryads to protect itself

PlantGenetics.TraitDef.label: self harvesting
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.desc: Automatically harvests at full growth - increases harvest multiplier by 1.15x
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.shortdesc: The plant will harvest itself when fully grown

PlantGenetics.TraitDef.label: self sowing
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.desc: Automatically plants clones around itself - decreases interval between sowing by 1.5x
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.shortdesc: The plant will plant copies around itself when above 50% growth

PlantGenetics.TraitDef.label: Rafflesia
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.desc: Produces rot stink gas - increases cells to fill by 2x
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.shortdesc: The plant will produce rot stink around itself

PlantGenetics.TraitDef.label: Noxious
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.desc: Produces tox gas - increases cells to fill by 2x
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.shortdesc: The plant will produce tox gas around itself

PlantGenetics.TraitDef.label: Shambling
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.desc: Produces dead life dust - increases cells to fill by 2x
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.shortdesc: The plant will produce deadlife dust around itself

PlantGenetics.TraitDef.label: Smokey
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.desc: Produces a heavy smoke - increases cells to fill by 2x
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.shortdesc: The plant will produce smoke around itself

PlantGenetics.TraitDef.label: Sticky
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.desc: Produces sticky plant mucilage around itself - decreases interval between spawning but increases filth radius and max filth points all by 1.5x
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.shortdesc: The plant will produce a sticky mucilage around itself

PlantGenetics.TraitDef.label: Blissful
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.desc: Produces a blissful effect - increases radius by 1.5x
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.shortdesc: The plant will produce a pleasent scent

PlantGenetics.TraitDef.label: Soothing
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.desc: Produces a soothing effect - increases radius and % gained/tick
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.shortdesc: The plant will produce a soothing scent
